CustomField.description: The color of the value fields for the mobile e-ticket. This color will be used for the values in each section of the e-ticket. Required format is #000000.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The color of the value fields for the mobile e-ticket. This color will be used for the values in each section of the e-ticket. Required format is #000000.
CustomField.label: ETicket Value Color
